Canonical | Software Engineer | Full Time | REMOTE

Canonical is the company behind Ubuntu Linux. We are a globally distributed team passionate about open source. We're looking for python/go developer who has devops experience and a test/QA passion to join our juju engineering team. Juju is a modeling and software orchestration tool that is capable of deploying to clouds, containers or bare metal.

More details and apply here: https://ldd.tbe.taleo.net/ldd03/ats/careers/requisition.jsp?...
